page.title: 06LEISURE
page.content:
ENTERTAINMENT IN MEDWAY
There is a Pitch and Putt in our area for all ages.It is closed every year between October 31st and April 1st.In Borstal there are a number of private sports clubs.There is a rowing club,2 tennis clubs and a yacht club.There are a variety of other clubs in this area. Many of these clubs are based at churches.They include such activities as Mother and Toddler Groups,Brownies, Guides,Cubs,Scouts, Youth Clubs,Retired Peoples Groups, Choirs,Dancing,Judo, Drama(Theatre), The Charity Group"Help The Aged"is particularly flourishing. Finally there is Medway Squash Club.
